template<class Iterator, class Vec1, class Vec2>\
inline static void _##__my_func__ (\
Iterator begin, const Iterator end, const Vec1& input, Vec2& output)\
{\
for (; begin != end; ++begin)\
begin-> __stoic_func__ (input, output);\
}\
